Ein sehr gut gemachtes Game, sowohl der Singelplayer als auch der Multiplayer. Es ist an gewissen Stellen schwierig, meistens/immer ist es ohne Hilfe machbar. Erfordert logisches Denken und zum Teil Geduld(bis man zu der Lösung kommt).
Insgesammt ein Spiel, das sich für den Preis definitiv lohnt.
I prefer the first game but it is still one of the best puzzle games ever made. I would 100% recommend this to anyone who is even remotely interested in puzzle games.

So far this gaming is amazing.


Features:

-Challenging and interesting 3D puzzles which don't really get old (so far)
-Looks great 
-Plays great
-Incredible voice acting
-Story seams really good do far
-Online co-op (Haven't tried it yet, so I don't know how good it is)
-Excellent, humorous writing
-Community made maps
-Interesting lore
-Several mods which I have not played, but look interesting
-Little playbale trailer for the films Super 8 (pretty cool; unexpected)
-Builds on the mechanics and lore of the first game
-Unfortunately (so far my only problem with the game) there are some places which have scripted events (pieces of the environment moving, etc.) and the pieces of the world that move have hit boxes which are bigger than the actual object, which restrict your movement somewhat (slightly annoying, but not a major problem at all).


I 100% recommend this game, and also surgest you purchase the first game too, just becuase it makes this one more enjoyable and more cohesive, however it shouldn't take you too long to figure out what's happeing if you are new to the Portal series.

So far 10/11 Leopard print turrets

NOTICE: I seem to believe I got this game on sale, but I think that it will prove to be worth the full price especially with all the extra community-made content that exists.

I don't find this game the best, multiplayer is fun, I have played multiple hours of that on the PS3

GAMEPLAY:
The game is unique, Portal Gun idea was amazing and can lead up to amazing levels. But I got bored of the main story around half way through, making levels is great fun and sharing them is even better

SOUND:
One word: Incredible

OVERALL
This is a good game, but not a critically aclaimed game in my opinion. Try it if you have $3 to spare. Multiplayer mode is the best mode.

This game is the BEST game human mind ever created. I'm serious. This is the pearl of gamemaking it is perfect game really perfect without any flaws. Plot is simply AMAZING, such great history would make high five to any Lucas film. Gameplay is very unique and entertaining. And this graphics, this surroundings underground laboratories, it is like you really have been there. This is not even 10-10, this is beyond and mark, no game can compete with Portal 2.

창의적이고 예술적이며 철학적인, 그야말로 경이로운 게임

그리고 터릿은 귀엽다. 갖고싶다...
刚开始的时候觉得新奇，绞尽脑汁的找路，越到后面就越没劲了，特别单人模式无聊的时候玩.........就更无聊了

Portal系列在解密游戏中也算是经典之作了，尤其第二部，在画面，剧情，配音，游戏性上都有了非常大的改进。虽然谜题难度相较Fez和Antichamber等还是简单了些，但在游戏整体的连贯性上，Portal绝对更胜一筹。本来就不短的游戏内容，再加上创意工坊中玩家自制的地图，Portal的寿命可以说是相当的长了，现在我偶尔也会逛逛社区实验室，尝试一下玩家自制的谜题。
原来也是先在别的地方[spoiler][strike]玩过了盗版[/strike][/spoiler]体会过了Portal，然后果断选择来给信仰充值，[spoiler]学生党经费不足，所以只买了Portal 2……[/spoiler]现在唯一的期望就是[strike]希望G胖早日会数三[/strike]

At full price I wouldn't bother with such an older game, but can be worth it due to it being a funnier portal 1 basically with a little more emphasis on story and some new kinds of puzzles. Puzzles are at times way too easy, only a couple puzzled me well. The mods keep this thing "still alive".

That said, I did get it for 4$ on sale, so....TOTALLY 110% worth it on sale.

This might be the single best game solo (And Coop) Game I have ever played.  The Story is amazing with hillarious characters and great gameplay.  This is such a great game.  I love everything about this game.  I have not played Portal and recently saw that Portal 2 was on sale for $5.  I have heard from my friends that this is one of the best games ever and I decided to see if they were lying.  They were not.  The level of effort and care Valve put into Portal 2 is amazing.  The worst thing about Portal 2 is that there is not Portal 3.  Which I would buy in an instant.  I love this game and would rate it a 10/10 as easily the best solo and coop game I have ever played.
Excelente juego... pero recomiendo mucho jugar en Cooperativo.

출시한지 5년이나 지난 게임이 이렇게 대작일줄은 .... 정말 갓겜임을 인정한다.
게임을 하시는분들은 반드시 해아한다고 말하는바이다.
